body:
Hi Mostafa,

Did you upload a tutorial or a workshop for this animation? 

I made an automated blinds in my research using Grasshopper, honeybee and ladybug, and I can get the daylight analysis for every hour separately.

But how to run an annual analysis while using an automated blinds? which responding parametrically with the sun movement, however, I saw the tutorial of Annual Daylight Simulation but I'm little confused.



Thanks
